title: British cyber-security giant Sophos succumbs too easily to American ambush
text:
First, The Great Hack, a Netflix documentary about the Cambridge Analytica scandal, now a possible sequel: The Ultimate Hack. It has a cracking plot to rival its predecessor: hapless British cybersecurity company has its defences breached by a stealth attack from America. What drama!

After that, it’s all a little familiar I’m afraid. Indeed, you may feel like you’ve seen it all a hundred times before – someone turns up waving a half-decent cheque for a UK company that’s had a rocky ride, and the board rolls over.

This time it’s Sophos, one of Britain’s top cybersecurity providers, and the opportunistic acquirer is the wonderfully-named Thoma Bravo, fittingly sounding more like a Slavic super-sleuth...
